definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: At a time when mountain too proud, uncle Mao Qingyuan the late news.
sentences.chinese: 就在高山春風得意之時，大伯毛清源過世的消息傳來。

sentences.english: After grandpa croaked, I inherited his pickup truck.
sentences.chinese: 祖父過世後我繼承了他的小卡車。

sentences.english: We were friends from that day, until the day he died.
sentences.chinese: 自那天起我們就成了莫逆之交，直到他過世。

sentences.english: Maybe you think you've seen just about everything!
sentences.chinese: 別以爲你已經見過世面，什麼都見過了。

sentences.english: Deceased friends and relatives coming back from the dead and acting strangely.
sentences.chinese: 你過世的朋友和親戚死而復生，行爲古怪。

sentences.english: If there’s a new Avatar, that means Aang has passed on.
sentences.chinese: 既然新神通登場，那就意味着安昂已經過世。

sentences.english: He was of a delicate mind and body, and he died at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 他心性敏感而體質柔弱，很早就過世了。

sentences.english: My father started it, but he died 19 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親是發起人，但是他19年前過世了。

sentences.english: People pay respects to the dead and clean the graves on the 5th of April.
sentences.chinese: 四月五日，人們掃墓並向過世的人表達敬意。

sentences.english: One cannot be selected as the head of the jury if one has not first been an approved WACS judge.
sentences.chinese: 沒當過世廚協會裁判的人是不能當陪審團的總代表的。

sentences.english: Wilde was baptised into the Catholic Church shortly before he died.
sentences.chinese: 王爾德在過世前受了天主教洗禮。
我的姐姐在那晚過世了。

sentences.english: Maathai is survived by three children.
sentences.chinese: 瑪塔依的三個孩子已經全部過世了。

sentences.english: The mom of Dagger Siu Lee, but she passed away.
sentences.chinese: 就是小李飛刀他娘，可惜她已經過世了。

sentences.english: A year ago, a very good friend of ours passed away unexpectedly …
sentences.chinese: 去年此時，我們的一個好朋友突然過世了。

sentences.english: After the liberation of Li Luo Huai died, his son diverted, the industry has no mass.
sentences.chinese: 解放後李洛懷過世，其子改行，其業遂不傳。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
